roleset.name: make be less, limit
roleset.note: CURTAIL-V NOTES: Trace chains get hard to follow. Be careful. (from curtail.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Most of the department's statements since the Northwest transaction indicated it-1 planned *trace*-1 to curtail foreign ownership stakes in U.S. carriers.
example.arg: foreign ownership stakes in U.S. carriers
